name: Into The Ruins (Artovis)
description:
This is my submission for Steve Lee's community Level Design Jam 002. The themes were Verticality and Non-Violence, so I opted to get out of my comfort zone and design a short platformer level.

One of my goals for this jam was familiarize myself with the basics of the Unity engine, and I made use of the free asset "3D Game Kit" to allow me to build the level with existing mechanics already implemented. Hope you enjoy! 

Cheers.
